name: Planks and Static Holds
description: Developing core endurance and stability through isometric holds.

cards.title: Forearm Plank for Core Endurance
cards.description: Holding a forearm plank to engage the core and stabilize posture.
bulletpoints: Maintain a neutral spine and avoid arching the lower back
Engage glutes and quads to support the position
Gradually increase duration to build endurance
cards.summaryText: Lock into a strong plank line, squeezing glutes and quads to hold steady.

cards.title: Side Plank for Oblique Activation
cards.description: Strengthening the obliques and stabilizer muscles through side planks.
bulletpoints: Align body in a straight line from head to feet
Engage the obliques to prevent sagging
Progress by adding leg lifts or arm reaches
cards.summaryText: Stack into a solid side plank and ignite obliques without dropping hips.
